data.text: Just back from this resort, mixed experience however. On the plus side, the staff were fantantastic and eager to please and the weather was glorious. On the down side, the location is quite out of the way and a busy road crossing is required to reach the beach (that said, a shuttle bus transfer is availabe from the hotel to the beach). About 70% of the guests were from the CIS countries and the balance from northern Europe. Unfortunately, both my partner and I suffered repeated bouts of digestive upset which took the shine off the stay.
data.title: Just back from this resort, mixed experience however ..

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest!
Warm Greeting from Sunrise Remal Resort!
We would like to thank you for your review and feedback.
As a company and as employees of this hotel we are taking great pride in our name and our reputation, hence being the one of best hotel in Sharm El Sheikh is not just a coincidence but an achievement with proven facts and hard work day after day.
At Sunrise Remal Resort we deeply care about our guests and we strive daily to deliver the best experience.
 It comes to us as a surprise to have read your disappointment in reference to your bouts of digestive upset as we have never had complaints from other guests with the same needs till now from yourselves. 
Your valuable feedback is really important to us, but kindly be informed that digestive problems can be associated with such aspects as weather changes and many others not related to food and drinks. Our hotel also cooperates with the international company Cristal and has all the necessary hygiene and quality certificates.
We certainly look forward to welcoming you back in the near future and should you do so feel free to contact us directly for any assistance.
Sincerely, Hotel Management.
owner_response.author: Emad Afify

data.text: Just spent an amazing week at this lovely hotel with my friend. Im a travel agent so it takes alot to impress us. The hotel, food and the staff were perfect. Its in a quiet area about 10 mins walk from the beach but there is a regular bus the hotel provides if not wanting to walk. The beach is by the sister hotel which is being renovated  but you can still get All Inclusive drinks and did see them doing a BBQ but didnt use it. The hotels beach stretches a far bit so you can avoid building noise. Theres loads of luxury villas being build in the area so will be very elite.  Nice short tranfer from the airport. We did a couple of excursions with GetyourGuide and a guy recommended from Tripadvisor called Mustafa. Atvs sunset safari and White Island boat trip. Both excellent.  Taxi to Soho Square and Naama Bay was enjoyable. The weather all week was perfect. Definitely highly recommend this holiday.
data.title: Fabulous Amazing Holiday ❤️

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Lindalopez!
Have a very nice day from Sunrise Remal Resort!
We hope you have had a nice trip back home and carry beautiful memories of your visit. 
Thank you for your positive feedback and sharing this with other travelers. 
We are very grateful that you have let other people know of your positive stay. 
We would be grateful to have the opportunity of welcoming you back and we look forward seeing you again at Sunrise Remal Hotel.

Kind regards, Hotel Management.
owner_response.author: Emad Afify

data.text: excellent bartender and bar menu, very tasty cuisine and restaurants, nice rooms, beautiful view and beach. The most important thing is the very hospitable staff. Special thanks to the bartender, everything was very great. I recommend the hotel to both families with children and young couples
data.title: During our holiday we really enjoyed everything, delicious cuisine and restaurants, good beach, diving and staff.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ruslan S,
Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We are overjoyed that you chose to spend your holidays with us and thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed it. Your kind words regarding our staff are much appreciated and it is fantastic to learn how special they made you feel during your stay. It was a pleasure to have you staying with us and we very much hope to welcome you back at your second home in the near future. 
Kind Regards,
Hotel management
owner_response.author: Emad Afify

data.text:
Just returned from a brilliant holiday. Excellent hotel, great welcome, without exception the staff (particularly Shebi) can’t do enough for you and made sure we were always ok. Service is honestly second to none. Very clean, spotless rooms (no plug in the bath), air con great, plenty of pool towels and sun beds, quiet and shaded kids pool … everyone else preferred the main pool so we had it all to ourselves. Close to the airport so no lengthy transfers, and close to Soho Square. Would definitely stay there again. 

The sister hotel is on the beach just down the road (free shuttle bus every 5 mins or so) but lots of construction work (we were there 13-20 March 2024) so you walk through a building site to reach it and it’s very noisy.  You can however walk a bit further down the beach to avoid the noise, so it's really not an issue, but the beach bar is back near the construction work. 

The all inclusive main buffet restaurant was pretty good and the other a la carte restaurants were lovely - you are only supposed to be able to go to one of those once for free during your stay but we were allowed as many times as we liked.  The food  was delicious (especially the Mediterranean and Egyptian restaurants, and the Indian was pretty good too) but just one drawback - it’s not great for coeliacs as there are very very limited gluten free options, especially breads (thank goodness I took my own) and pastries and desserts (no gf options at all, so it was fruit or nothing), and it would have been far easier if all the food labels could include symbols or codes to show if vegetarian, vegan, gf etc as it wasn’t at all clear and most staff didn’t know. The bars and restaurants all had QR codes to scan for drink, cocktail, mocktail and food menus but you then order from the waiter.

If you go on trips, ask at reception for a takeaway food bag which they fill with filled rolls, pastries, a banana, bottle of water and a juice drink, vegetables and olives. Again not gf but if you ask they can prepare something different. 

As I said in my review title, an excellent hotel!
data.title: Excellent hotel, would definitely recommend.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for your review, we’re delighted to learn that you loved your stay with us and that your opinion of the hotel is such a positive one. We hope you’ll be considering @SUNRISE Resorts & Cruises for your next visit to Egypt and we hope to welcome you back again soon.
Kind Regards,
Hotel management
owner_response.author: Emad Afify

data.text: I stayed at the resort in march during Ramadan for a birthday trip. Hamdey the spa manager and Roma was so helpful and attentive from the minute meeting them. The spa was excellent and well worth the money spent. I had henna done on my hands, a facial and a full body massage during my stay and I must say it was fantastic. Adley and hamdey were also so lovely and make my visit wonderful always ensuring me and my child were served so quickly when ordering drinks. Also Mohamed from the beach bar. Despite there being a lot of work being done next to the beach (which was not actually mentioned prior to booking) we spent a lot of our time down there. Ahmad and Waled from the diving centre really did make my trip a great experience  as they helped with excursions for trip. There were so many people that made the trip memorable for me and my son and the hotel staff were so helpful overall. I would say this is a lovely resort for families however there wasn’t a lot of british people and alot of things are catered to Russians ect which isn’t a problem. A lot of the hotel guest were lovely however some were not so welcoming which if your a person of colour can be a quiet intimidating. However I guess this is a fault of the hotel and more so of the people residing within it.
data.title: A lovely family holiday.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for trusting @SUNRISE Resorts & Cruises with this stay, as well as for taking the time to share a review about it. We’re pleased to know that the stay was up to your expectations. We hope to see you back with us in future.
Kind Regards,
Hotel management
owner_response.author: Emad Afify
